snippet: Newly disclosed details of the millions of dollars flowing into political groups highlight not just the scale of donations from corporation and unions but also the secrecy surrounding “super PACs.”
abstract: Newly disclosed details of the millions of dollars flowing into political groups highlight not just the scale of donations from corporations and unions but also the secrecy surrounding 'super PACs' seeking to influence the presidential race;” some money is from well-established concerns, but some checks are from sources obscured from public view.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and MICHAEL LUO
byline.contributor: Kitty Bennett, Griff Palmer and Katharine Mieszkowski contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Newly disclosed details of the millions of dollars flowing into political groups highlight not just the scale of donations from corporation and unions but also the secrecy surrounding “super PACs.”

headline.seo: ‘Super PAC’ Filings Show Power and Secrecy
headline.main: Secrecy Shrouds ‘Super PAC’ Funds in Latest Filings
headline.print_headline: Secrecy Shrouds ‘Super Pac’ Funds In Latest Filings

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
